enable_backup_schedule.title: Periodic automatic backup
enable_backup_schedule.description: Check this item to enable periodic backup. This may consume significant system resources.

enable_refresh_schedule.title: Periodic automatic refresh
enable_refresh_schedule.description: Check this item to enable periodic refresh difference view. This may consume significant system resources.

clean.title: Clean folder before each backup
clean.description: When selected, all contents within the backup folder will be deleted prior to backup. If not selected, the backup process will only overwrite files with matching names.
